title: missing emote(s)
body:
i haven't been documenting this very well. or at all really. but throughout my leveling i know i've acquired at least 2-3 emotes from chests and i've only ever been able to use two, one of which is the default. 

included is a screenshot of my emote collection - https://imgur.com/9icVwgF

i'll start saving screenshots of future emotes i acquire to cross reference my collection, or lackthereof *shrug*

replies.body: Hey, I looked into this for you but only see one emote that should be available on the account and it looks like you have it.  I don't see a history for any other emotes, unfortunately.  You did, however, automatically redeem some summoner icons through hextech including the Nightshade Serpent and Shiro icon.  Let me know if that clears things up!
